testcase.system-out: User Click on add Roles User enter name in Username text field :- Suhas User enter password in Password text field :- Paysecure@123 user enter email address in email address field :- paysecure@gmail.com user select role from roles dropdown :- paysecure@gmail.com User click on Add role button

testsuite.system-out: User enter ID in Username field User Enter Password in password field Click on submit button in login page User Click on Main Module - Manage Roles User is on the Manage Roles Main Module User Click on add Roles User enter name in Username text field :- Suhas User enter password in Password text field :- Paysecure@123 user enter email address in email address field :- paysecure@gmail.com user select role from roles dropdown :- paysecure@gmail.com User click on Add role button
